title: League of Legends wont open.
body: The symbol just pops up for a second then disappears, I would appreciate any help thanks.

replies.body: thanks i think its working it switched me to an older client and now its patching it to the new one.

I'm thinking that a security software or OS setting is blocking the patcher from launching.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that league is being allowed to open.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
